ygData.subject: Re: Plane of fear (Was Re: Bard Revenge)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Feerott. ... cant ... group ... Ahhh.. thanks.  And I shall be going there.  The worst can happen is I die... I hope. This is one of the reasons I play a
ygData.messageBody:
>From: David Lendrum <Karnek@...>
>Actually the Plane of Fear is entered behind the Spectre Cave in the
Feerott.
>Guarded by a pushover L40 Necromancer named Cyndreela...HUGE orange gate
cant
>miss it =)
>PS. I wouldn't touch this plane with a 10 foot pole unless your in a full
group
>of 45+ The L62 DrachoLiche is quite intense ; )
>Karnek D'Jester
>L41 Bard of Erollisi Marr


Ahhh.. thanks. And I shall be going there. The worst can happen is I
die... I hope.

This is one of the reasons I play a bard: I can go places others wouldn't
even attempt travelling to at my level. I had criscrossed most of Norrath
by level 7. Explored the Aviak Village with no one else in the zone, crept
through highhold when it was strewn with countless corpses, and was bereft
of anyone to save me if things went wrong. I learned then how the Orcs
behave when no one else is there to kill them, and then knew how safe the
place can be if one is careful.

I've really missed the thrill of exploring, and so I'll be going to Fear.
Somehow I don't think I'll ever reach level 45 before I finally leave EQ. I
level so slowly.

Roop
